ftp_server

Class FactoryUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • ftp_server.FactoryUser

  • public class FactoryUser
extends java.lang.Object
    Simply Factory to manage the Client of this server Clients are created in this constructor, it isn't a good way, but it's only for this project
    Author:
    Thomas Pierard
